name: contractually
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
according to what is written in a contract (= legal document): contractually bound/obliged They are contractually bound/obliged to finish the work. They are not contractually required to share knowledge with local partners. See
contractual
More examplesFewer examplesI am contractually prohibited from speaking about the new product until next year.The fighter is contractually entitled to a rematch.Contractually, the parties can decide between them who pays the costs.

Add to word list
according to what is stated in a contract: She was contractually entitled to €500,000. We are only asking people to do what they are contractually obliged to do.
